Description.Text: Muyan Suites is situated centrally in the historical Sultanahmet district, only 100 meters from Hippodrome. It offers nicely decorated rooms with modern amenities. The rooms feature elegant interiors with classical furniture. They are all equipped with air conditioning, LCD TV and a minibar. Free Wi-Fi is also provided in the rooms. Each morning, breakfast is served as an open buffet at Muyan Suites. Guests can also visit the numerous eateries of Sultanahmet with local and international cuisine. Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia and Basilica Cistern are 600 meters away. Topkapi Palace is 800 meters from the property. Ataturk Airport is 15 km away. Hotel Rooms: 14. Hotel also have some more amenities like dry cleaning, lobby, secretarial services and a reception.

Standard Suite - Standard Suite with one double bed and sofa bed includes air conditioning, alarm clock, bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable / satellite TV, clothes dryer, hairdryer, heating, internet access, iron / ironing board, kettle, laundry service, microwave oven, mini bar, modem / data port connection, non-smoking rooms, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom , tea and coffee making facilities, telephone, toaster and valet service. safety deposit box, desk, seating area, sofa, wooden / parquet floor, shower, bathrobe, free toiletries, toilet, bathroom, slippers, bath or shower, radio, satellite channels, flat-screen TV, tea/coffee maker, electric kettle, wake up service/alarm clock, wake up service. room size: 25 square meters. nicely decorated room with modern amenities.
